Content_wSideColumn.Name: Testimonials
Content_wSideColumn.Title: Testimonials
Content_wSideColumn.Abstract: The following are statements from past AFY participants.

MoveLeft.label: Toggle column right or left (right is default)

fbookTop.label: Put facebook at top of page

fbookDisplayed.label: Number of facebook messages to display

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
The following are statements from past AFY participants.

  • This week was amazing! I learned so much and grew in so many ways. It was incredible and I'm glad I had this experience.
  • Amazing! I loved it!!! I would love to come again. Very spiritual, fun, and you meet amazing people.
  • AFY has been an amazing experience! I loved every aspect of this program! There wasn't one activity I loved the most - I loved it all! I can't wait to come next year.
  • Wow! I had so much fun! My leaders were spectacular! They made this a great opportunity for me to grow and learn. AFY ROCKS MY SOCKS!
  • This program was amazing and I'll always hold the people I met close to my heart. I loved every moment of it and it was amazing to be around people with the same standards. The counselors were amazing. I love you guys. Thank you.
  • Thank you SO MUCH! It was an AMAZING experience! It just went way too fast! Every activity was really, really good! It was an awesome week full of fun, the spirit, challenge, adventure and new friends.
  • It was literally life changing. This program was exactly what I needed.
  • This year was great! Even better than last year! I liked how gospel learning was added with activities. I had a blast!! Wished it never ended.
  • I had a very good experience at AFY. My testimony grew a lot and Badger Creek rafting was a ton of fun.
  • I LOVE AFY! AMAZING!!!
  • I love everything! Best week of my life!
  • I really enjoyed AFY! I just wish it lasted longer!
  • It was really fun. I liked the balance of spiritual/fun activities.
  • I loved it! It was fun and we were always doing something.
  • It was a blast! Thanks a ton!
  • It was wonderful. Fantabulous. I liked the whitewater rafting and AFY TV.
  • I love it! It was a great experience I won't forget! Thank you! I loved it all!
  • The whole thing was AMAZING!! I love AFY. It is the greatest thing I've ever done!
  • So much fun, I wish it was another week longer.
  • AFY was sooo fun! I loved how you applied the activities to life! That was awesome! Definitely keep doing AFY-TV because it is a blast! Thanks so much! I loved this week!
  • Awesome experience, perfect, thanks!
